Uses of Package
net.proteusframework.email

  • Packages that use net.proteusframework.email 
    Package Description
    net.proteusframework.email
    Provides a centralized way to handle e-mail templates in Proteus.
    net.proteusframework.email.config
    Implementations for EmailConfig and EmailConfigType.
  • Classes in net.proteusframework.email used by net.proteusframework.email 
    Class and Description
    EmailConfig
    Base class for EmailConfiguration entities.
    EmailConfigType
    Defines an IImplementationModel for configuring EmailTemplate s for specific uses.
    EmailConfigType.PreInitContext
    Pre Component.init data that may be useful for creating your UI code.
    EmailTemplate
    The central entity for persistent e-mail templates.
    EmailTemplateContext
    Context information when operating on EmailTemplates.
    EmailTemplateContext.Mode
    Process mode.
    EmailTemplateContext.StandardAttribute
    Standard attributes for the processing context.
    EmailTemplateDAO
    Data access object for EmailTemplate.
    EmailTemplateException
    Exception thrown to indicate an error related to EmailTemplate processing / use.
    EmailTemplateProcessor
    Processor for email templates.
    EmailTemplateRecipient
    EmailTemplate Recipient.
  • Classes in net.proteusframework.email used by net.proteusframework.email.config 
    Class and Description
    EmailConfig
    Base class for EmailConfiguration entities.
    EmailConfigType
    Defines an IImplementationModel for configuring EmailTemplate s for specific uses.
    EmailConfigType.PreInitContext
    Pre Component.init data that may be useful for creating your UI code.
    EmailTemplate
    The central entity for persistent e-mail templates.
    EmailTemplateContext
    Context information when operating on EmailTemplates.
    EmailTemplateException
    Exception thrown to indicate an error related to EmailTemplate processing / use.
